title: President, PM laud security forces for successful operation in Duki
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 29 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari and Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif Sunday appreciated the security forces for a successful operation against Indian sponsored Fitna al Hindustan terrorist organization in Duki area of Balochistan province.
The president and the prime minister praised the security forces for eliminating two terrorists of Fitna al Hindustan.
According to a press release, the president said that the entire nation was proud of its security forces for their professional expertise, bravery and sacrifices, and was standing with them.
The security forces were determined to root out Indian patronized terrorism, he said and reaffirmed to end cancer of terrorism forever.
The prime minister reiterated that the security forces were acting like bulwark to eradicate terrorism from the country and expressed governmentâ€™s resolve to complete elimination of terrorism in the country, PM Office Media Wing said in a press release.
